original: Majjhima Nikāya 17
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Vanapatthasutta
analyzed: vanapattha sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “vanapatthapariyāyaṁ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi,
analyzed: vanapattha pariyāyam vaḥ bhikkhave desessāmi

original: taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasikarotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam suṇātha sādhukam manasikarotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataram vana pattham upanissāya viharati

original: Tassa taṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati na upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca
analyzed: tassa tam vana pattham upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati na upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca

original: cittaṁ na samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā na parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca
analyzed: cittam na samādhiyati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavāḥ na parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca

original: anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ nānupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam na anupāpuṇāti

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā—te kasirena samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te kasirena samudāgacchanti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṁ:
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā iti

original: ‘ahaṁ kho imaṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharāmi, tassa me imaṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya
analyzed: aham kho imam vana pattham upanissāya viharāmi tassa me imam vana pattham upanissāya

original: viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati na upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca cittaṁ na samādhiyati,
analyzed: viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati na upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca cittam na samādhiyati

original: aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā na parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ nānupāpuṇāmi.
analyzed: a parikkhīṇā ca āsavāḥ na parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttaram yogakkhemam na anupāpuṇāmi

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā—te kasirena samudāgacchantī’ti.
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te kasirena samudāgacchanti iti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā rattibhāgaṁ vā divasabhāgaṁ vā tamhā vanapatthā pakkamitabbaṁ, na vatthabbaṁ.
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā ratti bhāgam vā divasa bhāgam vā tamhā vana patthā pakkamitabba na vatthabba

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharati.
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataram vana pattham upanissāya viharati

original: Tassa taṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati na upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca
analyzed: tassa tam vana pattham upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati na upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca

original: cittaṁ na samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā na parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca
analyzed: cittam na samādhiyati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavāḥ na parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca

original: anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ nānupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam na anupāpuṇāti

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā—te appakasirena samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te appakasirena samudāgacchanti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṁ:
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā iti

original: ‘ahaṁ kho imaṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharāmi. Tassa me imaṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya
analyzed: aham kho imam vana pattham upanissāya viharāmi tassa me imam vana pattham upanissāya

original: viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati na upaṭṭhāti asamāhitañca cittaṁ na samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā
analyzed: viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati na upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca cittam na samādhiyati aparikkhīṇā

original: ca āsavā na parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ nānupāpuṇāmi.
analyzed: ca āsavāḥ na parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttaram yogakkhemam na anupāpuṇāmi

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā—te appakasirena samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te appakasirena samudāgacchanti

original: Na kho panāhaṁ cīvarahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito na piṇḍapātahetu …pe… na senāsanahetu …pe… na gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
analyzed: na kho pana aham cīvara hetu agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ na piṇḍapāta hetu pe na senāsana hetu pe na gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhāra hetu agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ

original: Atha ca pana me imaṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati na upaṭṭhāti,
analyzed: atha ca pana me imam vana pattham upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati na upaṭṭhāti

original: asamāhitañca cittaṁ na samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā na parikkhayaṁ gacchanti,
analyzed: asamāhitam ca cittam na samādhiyati aparikkhīṇā ca āsavāḥ na parikkhayam gacchanti

original: ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ nānupāpuṇāmī’ti.
analyzed: an anuppattam ca anuttaram yogakkhemam na anupāpuṇāmi iti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṅkhāpi tamhā vanapatthā pakkamitabbaṁ, na vatthabbaṁ.
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā pakkamitabba na vatthabba

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharati.
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataram vana pattham upanissāya viharati

original: Tassa taṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca
analyzed: tassa tam vana pattham upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca

original: cittaṁ samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ
analyzed: cittam samādhiyati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttara

original: yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā,
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā ācīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārā

original: te kasirena samudāgacchanti. Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṁ:
analyzed: te kasirena samudāgacchanti tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabba

original: ‘ahaṁ kho imaṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharāmi.
analyzed: aham kho imam vanapattham upanissāya viharāmi

original: Tassa me imaṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati upaṭṭhāti asamāhitañca
analyzed: tassa me imam vana pattham upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca

original: cittaṁ samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ
analyzed: cittam samādhiyati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttara

original: yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāmi.
analyzed: yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāmi

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā—te kasirena samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te kasirena samudāgacchanti

original: Na kho panāhaṁ cīvarahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito, na piṇḍapātahetu …pe… na senāsanahetu …pe… na gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
analyzed: na kho pana aham cīvara hetu agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ na piṇḍapāta hetu pe na senāsana hetu pe na gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhāra hetu agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ

original: Atha ca pana me imaṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati upaṭṭhāti,
analyzed: atha ca pana me imam vana pattham upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati upaṭṭhāti

original: asamāhitañca cittaṁ samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca
analyzed: asamāhitam ca cittam samādhiyati aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca

original: anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāmī’ti.
analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāmi iti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṅkhāpi tasmiṁ vanapatthe vatthabbaṁ, na pakkamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā tasmin vanapatthe vatthabba na pakkamitabba

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharati.
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataram vana pattham upanissāya viharati

original: Tassa taṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca

analyzed: cittam samādhiyati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttara

original: yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā—te appakasirena samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te appakasirena samudāgacchanti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṁ:

original: ‘ahaṁ kho imaṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya viharāmi. Tassa me imaṁ vanapatthaṁ upanissāya
analyzed: aham kho imam vana pattham upanissāya viharāmi tassa me imam vana pattham upanissāya

original: viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati upaṭṭhāti asamāhitañca cittaṁ samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā
analyzed: viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca cittam samādhiyati aparikkhīṇā

original: ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāmi.
analyzed: ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāmi

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā—te appakasirena samudāgacchantī’ti.
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā ā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te appakasirena samudāgacchanti iti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā yāvajīvampi tasmiṁ vanapatthe vatthabbaṁ, na pakkamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā yāvajīvam pi tasmin vana patthe vatthabba na pakkamitabba

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ gāmaṁ upanissāya viharati …pe…
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataram gāmaṃ upanissāya viharati pe

original: aññataraṁ nigamaṁ upanissāya viharati …pe…
analyzed: aññataram nigamam upanissāya viharati pe

original: aññataraṁ nagaraṁ upanissāya viharati …pe…
analyzed: aññataram nagaram upanissāya viharati pe

original: aññataraṁ janapadaṁ upanissāya viharati …pe…
analyzed: aññataram janapadam upanissāya viharati pe

original: aññataraṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharati.
analyzed: aññataram puggalam upanissāya viharati

original: Tassa taṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati na upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca
analyzed: tassa tam puggalam upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati na upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca

analyzed: cittam na samādhiyati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavāḥ na parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca

analyzed: aham kho imam puggalam upanissāya viharāmi tassa me imam puggalam upanissāya viharato

original: anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati na upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca cittaṁ na samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā

original: ca āsavā na parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ nānupāpuṇāmi.
analyzed: ca āsavāḥ na parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttaram yogakkhemam na anupāpuṇāmi

analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te kasirena samudāgacchanti iti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā rattibhāgaṁ vā divasabhāgaṁ vā so puggalo anāpucchā pakkamitabbaṁ, nānubandhitabbo.

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharati.
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataram puggalam upanissāya viharati

original: Tassa taṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati na upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca
analyzed: tassa tam puggalam upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati na upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca

analyzed: cittam na samādhiyati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavāḥ na parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca

analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam na anupāpuṇāti

analyzed: na kho pana aham cīvara hetu agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ na piṇḍapāta hetu pe na senāsana hetu pe na gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhāra hetu agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ

analyzed: atha ca pana me imam puggalam upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati na upaṭṭhāti

original: asamāhitañca cittaṁ na samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā na parikkhayaṁ gacchanti,
analyzed: asamāhitam ca cittam na samādhiyati aparikkhīṇā ca āsavāḥ na parikkhayam gacchanti

original: ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ nānupāpuṇāmī’ti.
analyzed: an anuppattam ca anuttaram yogakkhemam na anupāpuṇāmi iti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṅkhāpi so puggalo āpucchā pakkamitabbaṁ, nānubandhitabbo.
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā saṅkhā api saḥ puggalaḥ

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharati.
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataram puggalam upanissāya viharati

original: Tassa taṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca
analyzed: tassa tam puggalam upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca

original: cittaṁ samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ
analyzed: cittam samādhiyati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttara

original: yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā—te kasirena samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te kasirena samudāgacchanti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṁ:
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā iti

original: ‘ahaṁ kho imaṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharāmi. Tassa me imaṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharato
analyzed: aham kho imam puggalam upanissāya viharāmi tassa me imam puggalam upanissāya viharato

original: anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca cittaṁ samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca
analyzed: anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca cittam samādhiyati aparikkhīṇā ca

original: āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāmi.
analyzed: āsavāḥ parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāmi

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā—te kasirena samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te kasirena samudāgacchanti

original: Na kho panāhaṁ cīvarahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito, na piṇḍapātahetu …pe… na senāsanahetu …pe… na gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
analyzed: na kho pana aham cīvara hetu agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ na piṇḍapāta hetu pe na senāsana hetu pe na gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhāra hetu agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ

original: Atha ca pana me imaṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati upaṭṭhāti,
analyzed: atha ca pana me imam puggalam upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati upaṭṭhāti

original: asamāhitañca cittaṁ samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca
analyzed: asamāhitam ca cittam samādhiyati aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca

original: anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāmī’ti.
analyzed: anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāmi iti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṅkhāpi so puggalo anubandhitabbo, na pakkamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā saṅkhā api saḥ puggalaḥ anubandhitabbaḥ na pakkamitabba

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharati.
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataram puggalam upanissāya viharati

original: Tassa taṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharato anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca
analyzed: tassa tam puggalam upanissāya viharataḥ anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca

original: cittaṁ samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ
analyzed: cittam samādhiyati a parikkhīṇā ca āsavā parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttara

original: yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāti.
analyzed: yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāti

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā—te appakasirena samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te appakasirena samudāgacchanti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṁ:
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā iti

original: ‘ahaṁ kho imaṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharāmi. Tassa me imaṁ puggalaṁ upanissāya viharato
analyzed: aham kho imam puggalam upanissāya viharāmi tassa me imam puggalam upanissāya viharato

original: anupaṭṭhitā ceva sati upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca cittaṁ samādhiyati, aparikkhīṇā ca
analyzed: anupaṭṭhitā ca iva sati upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca cittam samādhiyati aparikkhīṇā ca

original: āsavā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, ananuppattañca anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ anupāpuṇāmi.
analyzed: āsavāḥ parikkhayam gacchanti an anuppattam ca anuttaram yogakkhemam anupāpuṇāmi

original: Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā—cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā—te appakasirena samudāgacchantī’ti.
analyzed: ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvita parikkhārā samudānetabbā ā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārā te appakasirena samudāgacchanti iti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā yāvajīvampi so puggalo anubandhitabbo, na pakkamitabbaṁ, api panujjamānenapī”ti.
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā yāvajīvam pi saḥ puggalaḥ anubandhitabbaḥ na pakkamitabbaḥ api panujjamānena api iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Vanapatthasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ sattamaṁ.
